channel.title: Remake of Half Life Opposing Force
channel.description: I think that after they are done with making Black Mesa Source they should remake Half Life Opposing Force in the Future! Half Life Opposing Force was one of my Favorite Half Life's and they should make it with the same Source engine they did with Black Mesa Source. Who else agree's with me? :slight_smile:

item.title: Remake of Half Life Opposing Force
item.dc:creator: brokenfridgehinge
item.description:
There is already another mod team working on an OpFor remake.

https://www.moddb.com/mods/operation-black-mesa

Read full topic
item.source: Remake of Half Life Opposing Force
